mapper.update:
update gl_prod_accounting
PROFIT_CENTRE = #{profitCentre,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUSINESS_UNIT = #{businessUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GL_CODE_A = #{glCodeA,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GL_CODE_L = #{glCodeL,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GL_CODE_INT_E = #{glCodeIntE,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GL_CODE_INT_PAY = #{glCodeIntPay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GL_CODE_INT_I = #{glCodeIntI,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GL_CODE_INT_REC = #{glCodeIntRec,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GL_CODE_INT_ACR = #{glCodeIntAcr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GL_CODE_ODP_I = #{glCodeOdpI,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GL_CODE_ODP_REC = #{glCodeOdpRec,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GL_CODE_ODP_ACR = #{glCodeOdpAcr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GL_CODE_ODI_I = #{glCodeOdiI,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GL_CODE_ODI_REC = #{glCodeOdiRec,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GL_CODE_ODI_ACR = #{glCodeOdiAcr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GL_CODE_A_LOSS = #{glCodeALoss,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GL_CODE_ADJUST = #{glCodeAdjust,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where ACCOUNTING_STATUS = #{accountingStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PROD_TYPE = #{prodType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
